00095 class MeanSquaredError : virtual public ModelInterface {
00096  public:
00097 
00098 //===========================================================================
00130  double error(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target) {
00131     double se = 0;
00132     if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00133       Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00134       model(input, output);
00135       for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(0); c++) {
00136         se += (target(c) - output(c)) * (target(c) - output(c));
00137       }
00138     } else {
00139       Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00140       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00141         model(input[pattern], output);
00142         for(unsigned c = 0; c < target.dim(1); c++) {
00143           se += (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (target(pattern, c) - output(c));
00144         }
00145       }
00146     }
00147     // normalise
00148     se /= target.nelem();
00149     return se;
00150   }
00151 
00152 //===========================================================================
00190   double derror(const Array<double> &input, const Array<double> &target, bool returnError=true) {
00191     dedw = 0;
00192     double se = 0;
00193     if(input.ndim() == 1) {
00194       Array<double> output(target.dim(0));
00195       dmodel(input, output);
00196       for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++) {
00197         if (returnError)
00198           se += (target(c) - output(c)) * (target(c) - output(c));
00199         for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++) {
00200           dedw(i) -= (target(c) - output(c)) * dmdw(c, i);
00201         }
00202       }
00203     } else {
00204       Array<double> output(target.dim(1));
00205       for(unsigned pattern = 0; pattern < input.dim(0); ++pattern) {
00206         dmodel(input[pattern], output);
00207         for(unsigned c = 0; c < output.nelem(); c++) {
00208           if(returnError)
00209             se += (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * (target(pattern, c) - output(c));
00210           for(unsigned i = 0; i < dedw.nelem(); i++)
00211             dedw(i) -= (target(pattern, c) - output(c)) * dmdw(c, i);
00212         }
00213       }
00214     }
00215     // normalise
00216     dedw *= 2. / target.nelem();
00217     if (returnError)
00218       se /= target.nelem(); 
00219     else 
00220       se = -1;
00221     return se;
00222   }
00223 
00224 };
